ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Gary Townsend for data acquisition and support and Katherine Smith for preparation of the data used in this manuscript.

This work was funded by a National Science Foundation, Human and Social Dynamics “Agents of Change” award (SES-HSD-AOC, BCS-0826779 and BCS-0826840) to P.D. and by the Eppley Foundation and New York Community Trust.
